Ethernet MAC Low Level Driver

Introduction

EMAC driver provides a well defined API layer which allows applications to use the EMAC peripheral to control the flow of packet data from the processor to the PHY and the MDIO module to control PHY configuration and status monitoring . For a complete list of APIs supported refer to EMAC LLD Functions.
